reason: Regulatory uncertainty (Senate bill withdrawal, unified SEC/CFTC approach) creates headwinds for Bitcoin. Its underperformance relative to surging gold suggests a risk-off sentiment is impacting digital assets. While institutional adoption (Capital One acquiring Brex) and long-term bullish outlooks (Ark Invest) provide fundamental support, short-term catalysts are mixed to negative, indicating a period of potential consolidation or downward pressure as smart money may be offloading positions.
headlines: Coinbase VP says ‘fatal flaws’ in Senate crypto bill forced sudden withdrawal of support
Capital One agrees to acquire credit card, stablecoin payment enabler Brex
SEC, CFTC to push united crypto work now that they both have Trump-appointed heads
Gold surges to doorstep of $5,000 as experts debate bitcoin's underperformance
Ark Invest sees bitcoin and tokenization driving the next phase of digital asset growth
